manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy Your Favorite Music Like Never Before, With These Exquisite Headphones Brought To You By BERIBES ! The BERIBES Bluetooth headphones will give you a deep, powerful, and immersive sound at any volume, make your overall listening experience just that much better. Our goal has always been committed to providing our customers with better sound quality as the focal point of our engineering. Are you looking for a high-end quality pair of headphones to enjoy your music, movies, and games? Have you tried similar products in the past but were let down by how flimsy they were or by how quickly they stopped working? Would you opt for an earphone set that is durable, heavy duty, and doesn’t cost you a month’s salary? If so, then this is your lucky day, because BERIBES has just the thing you’re looking for!

Notice: Long press for volume up and down, click for next or previous track Long press the 'O 'button for 4S to start the headphones until it enters the Bluetooth pairing mode (red and blue lights flash alternately), then use the device you need to connect to search, find the Bluetooth pairing name 'WH202A' and click Connect.

Multipoint Connection Connect to two Bluetooth devices at the same time to switch between calls, games, listening to music, and more without needing to reconnect. Provide a more convenient use experience. High Quality Headphones BERIBES 6EQ Headphones are made of high quality materials, which enable our products to have a longer service life, more upscale look, better texture, better function. Rotatable and Foldable Foldable and rotatable design makes the headset very convenient whether it is placed in a backpack or hung around the neck. Make it easier and more convenient to carry around.

Comfort Fit Only 0.38lb bluetooth headphones and memory protein earmuff provide all day comfort for ears and head, and unique earcup design allows the headphones to fit better in the ear. HD Microphone Built-in HD microphone supported by exclusive technology provides a clearer and more soundproof call experience during calls, as if talking face to face with relatives and friends. Wired Mode If you suddenly have no power during use, you can plug included 3.5mm audio cable to complete a seamless toggle, and by included lightweight carrying pouch, enjoy uninterrupted music anytime anywhere.

Key Specifications Mode: 6EQ Modes (Pop、Rock、Vocal、Jazz、BassUp、Classic ) Bluetooth Version: V5.3 Impedance: 32Ω±15% Driver (Full Range): 2 × 40 mm Frequency Response: 20Hz~30kHz Range: 33ft Sensitivity: 116.4±3dB Charge Time: 2-2.5 Hours Use a 5.0V==1.0A (or higher than 1.0A) charger to charge BERIBES headphones wireless bluetooth Compatible: Phone, MP3, MP4, Pc, Laptops, iPad, iPhone, Android and other bluetooth devices How to Use Smart One Connect Two： 1. Make sure the over ear headphones have been connected to the first Bluetooth device successfully. 2. Turn off the first device's Bluetooth. 3. Turn on the second device's Bluetooth, find the "WH202A” and select it to pair with your device. 4. Turn on the first device's Bluetooth and select "WH202A" to pair it again.now your headset is connected to the 2 devices at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Someone wrote that they returned them because they didn’t work well with her laptop. Well I’m here to tell you that they work just perfectly with my laptop! As well as for my dad’s phone too (we purchased two of them).The battery life is phenomenal so far. I’ve only been using them for about 3-4 days, so about a total of 6 hours of usage and they’ve only gone from 75% battery to 60% in that time (the percentage can be seen on Bluetooth pairing settings in Windows 11).Granted, battery life tends to reduce over time but for the time being it’s excellent. Not sure I believe it can last 65 hours actively from full though.Sound quality for the price I got these for is more than adequate too. I have an old $350 pair of Astros that sound obviously better but comfort wise they suck in comparison.Which brings me to my next point. Comfort. These Beribes headphones are the most comfortable cheaply priced set I’ve ever worn. I’ve tried several brands over the years and these take the cake by a long shot.The microphone included is something I believe every headset should have at the very least nowadays. It’s funny how there will be some headphones that are super expensive like some Bose QC or something which wouldn’t even have a simple omnidirectional mic. It’s kinda pathetic imo. Well these do have one, omnidirectional meaning they take sound from all angles because they don’t have a boom mic, but that’s ok because it’s not the main thing you buy them for anyway. Just nice to have if you’re up get a call or use it for video conferencing like me.Only unfortunate thing is they can’t be used for PlayStation 5 as it doesn’t support Bluetooth headset without a USB dongle. Other than that they’re perfection.They’re currently at a discount for the holidays I assume and I can’t recommend them enough if you need a pair of Bluetooth headphones for any Bluetooth capable device. They’re fantastic and well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I honestly went through 6 pairs of headphones before getting these. For the price, they are truly fantastic. The thing I like most is that they are lightweight, not too tight on my ears, and the sound quality is really good for the price. I ordered a second pair for my husband, and he also likes them as he can wear them comfortably with his glasses on. I need them for traveling on the plane and trains in Europe and these fit my needs perfectly. They connect easily with phone, computer, and Chromebook. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The battery lasts for a long time, and the charging is fast. However, the charger it comes with it very short so the headphones have to sit on the floor next to the outlet.The volume buttons do not work at all. Nothing happens when you press them.The sound quality is okay. It sounds a little muffled compared to my wired headphones from a different brand. This isn’t a big problem though. It’s easy to get used to.These block out noise surprisingly well, even at a low volume. I’m impressed with that!They are comfortable to wear for long periods of time.I have not tried the microphone yet. I probably won’t, because I got these for music, not phone calls.Overall I do like these headphones! I just wish the volume buttons worked and that it came with a longer charging cord.:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good for inexpensive headphones!
reviews.reviewText: I've had these for about 5 months now and really like them. The reason I got them was to have some Bluetooth headphones I could wear when I go for walks or want to watch my shows without disturbing the rest of the family. My hearing is also not great, so it helps to have headphones, which improves my ability to hear what I am listening to or watching. I use them daily for around 2-5 hours or more. Typically I use them for watching videos on my iPad and Instagram/TikTok on my Android phone. I also like to wear them while working out (walking). They pair easily with both my devices. The controls work fine and they hold a charge for quite a few days. The noise cancellation is actually pretty good for cheap headphones! I definitely have to take them off to have a conversation and hear what my family members are saying. I was mostly worried that they would get dirty because they're white, especially since I wear makeup, but they haven't stained at all. The other concern I had was that the fake leather would fade or crack with how much I wear them while exercising, but so far it has held up very well. I like that they can fold up for travel but haven't needed to use that feature yet. Overall really pleased with this purchase and would definitely buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best you can ask for considering $$.
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected.Coming from neckband-in-ear headphones (also BT5.3)- Comfort surprising. Very light and soft padding everywhere, ear fits in fine, nice for long wear. Only heats up with activity.- Sound: Can't be an audiophile over BT. Much better than in ear phones. Bass and volume is better for all categories of listening.- BT5.3: Anything with this chip has great battery life. The two source connect is a great feature. (one at a time, sound switches to a source when it goes from silent to playing.) Range is a bit better than neckband. Sadly it's got the odd British lady reporting connect and power. I like tones better.For the price, it's a great product. But don't expect beats or Bose performance.Buttons: Why is it beyond our technology suddenly to have enough buttons to run the thing? Shared functions on the +/- btns. But it's worse... they put volume on the long click. If you can't fit two more buttons, at least make it configurable as to which function is long-press (or add one toggle button to ctrl what btns mean). I need skip without digging for the phone for podcasts, etc. But adjusting volume with a long press is awkward and stupid. Just have two sets of +/- and charge another $5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Remote Office
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something other than ear buds for my office. I love the over the ear speakers. Incredibly comfortable! It was easy to connect to Bluetooth on all my Apple devices! Sounds quality is excellent and microphone works great! Battery life is fantastic! No issues at all!

reviews.reviewerName: Llegó en la fecha indicada. Este tipo de shampoo es muy bueno. Todo el tratamiento para el cabello queda súper suavecito y aromático

reviews.reviewTitle: Price point is on point - Just buy them.
reviews.reviewText: I had AirPods that died and I’ve been looking at over the ear headphones for a while - I was iffy about spending hundreds of dollars and I found these. I cannot even express the way that they exceeded everything I expected. For the price point you will likely never find anything quite as good. They are CUTE, comfortable and the sound quality is *chefs kiss*. Not to mention the never ending battery life, and easy set up. I am going to buy multiples of these. They’re loud enough, they aren’t necessary the best at noise cancelling but who cares who can hear me. I can’t hear a thing when they are on my ears and my music is on. Highly recommend. Will be buying again.

Premièrement, le rapport qualité/prix est incroyable. Pour un prix de 25€ environ, la qualité offerte par ce casque est très satisfaisante.Le design est plutôt sobre et épuré, donc très discret si vous souhaitez l'utiliser dans la rue, les transports etc.Niveau confort, c'est un vrai plaisir. Les coussinets sont doux et enveloppent bien les oreilles, ce qui rend l'écoute agréable même après un long moment passé avec. Pas de douleur ni de gêne sur cette même longue période.La qualité du son est également remarquable, tout est relatif bien évidemment, pour le prix du casque ne vous attendez pas à quelque chose d'exceptionnel mais ça reste une agréable surprise, honnêtement je ne m'attendais pas à ça.Pas de réduction de bruit sur ce casque mais le fait que ce soit un casque fermé isole très bien des bruits extérieurs.L'aspect pratique de ce casque est un autre point fort. Il est pliable, donc très facile à transporter. Cela le rend idéal pour les voyages ou simplement pour le ranger dans un sac sans prendre trop de place.Pour terminer, il tient très bien sur la tête. Que je sois en train de marcher, de courir ou même de faire du sport, le casque reste bien en place et ne glisse pas.Je recommande.

BERIBES Cuffie Bluetooth Over EarPremetto che ho preso queste cuffie per una persona anziana che per sentire la TV metteva il volume a 70 😁La TV in questione non era bluetooth e quindi ho dovuto acquistare anche un trasmettitore/ricevitore bluetooth da collegare al televisore Panasonic.Cosa arrivaAll'arrivo della confezione 🎁 sono rimasto stupido da quanto piccola fosse. Invece all'interno ho trovato le cuffie 🎧 ben riposte con i cuscinetti auricolari che si piegano/ruotano in modo da occupare meno spazio. Oltre alle cuffie all'interno c'era un cavetto per la ricarica (presa type-C), un cavo AUX da 3.5 mm per poterle usare collegate direttamente alla TV ed un piccolo libretto di istruzioni. Non è presente la presa ed ho usato quella del cellulare.DescrizioneLe cuffie sono molto carine, regolabili e con i cuscinetti pieghevoli/rotanti. Cuscinetti molto morbidi che non danno fastidio. All'interno di ogni cuscinetto c'è rispettivamente la lettera L o R.Sulla cuffia di destra (R) troviamo la presa per la ricarica, il led indicatore della carica (blu/rosso) il pulsante di accensione/spegnimento due pulsanti per volume/brano (su/giù o precedente/successivo), la presa audio per il jack da 3.5 mm ed il microfono (che non ho provato).Sulla cuffia sinistra (L) troviamo solo il pulsante EQ per cambiare le varie modalità (classic, jazz, pop, ecc).UtilizzoAppena arrivate le ho caricate una decina di minuti (e la luce indicata era blu) per poter installare/collegare il tutto.Si sentiva un ronzio di fondo e infine l'audio era diventato mono.Temendo di aver fatto un errore nell'acquisto causa mancata compatibilità o con la Tv o con il trasmettitore bluetooth ho voluto riprovare e lasciare quindi le cuffie sotto carica per le 2 ore e mezza indicate per una carica completa ⏱️.Riaccesa la TV e fatto il pairing con le cuffie, l'audio 🔊 si è dimostrato veramente ottimo. A mio avviso sembra di essere al cinema, parere puramente soggettivo. Da quel momento chi le deve usare non se le toglie più e grazie anche al fatto che si sente la TV anche dagli altoparlanti pure con le cuffie collegate (altoparlanti che si possono tuttavia inibire), anche chi è in stanza può ascoltare la TV ma ad un volume più ragionevole 🤣. Non ho utilizzato nè provato il cavo AUX 3.5 mm in quanto non è lungo abbastanza per poterlo utilizzare con la TV restando seduti in divano.Funzionalità🔋 ricarica: Per una carica completa è indicato 2 ore e mezza per una funzionalità di 65 ore. Se durano veramente 65 ore non lo so ma durano parecchio.Presa di ricarica: il cavo type-c si inserisce abbastanza facilmente ma è un po' duretto nell'estrazione, cosa, dal mio punto di vista, non negativa.Accensione/spegnimento: per accendere le cuffie basta tenere premuto un paio di secondi il pulsante multifunzione (MTF) fino a che non si accende il led blu. Per lo spegnimento tenere premuto qualche secondo in più lo stesso pulsante fino a che non si spegne il led.Per l'utilizzo che ne verrà fatto e per le conoscenze di utilizzo di questa persona non le ho fatto usare nessun altro pulsante. Ho solo impostato tramite il pulsante EQ, posizionato nella cuffia sinistra, il suono a mio avviso migliore.ConclusioniQuello che dovevano fare lo fanno in maniera egregia, rapporto qualità/prezzo ottimo. Non credevo funzionassero così bene.Adesso il volume della tv, per gli altri, è accettabile.Funzionalità: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Suono: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Facilità d'uso: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Estetica: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Per quanto mi riguarda hanno risolto un bel problema e visto il suono ed il prezzo che hanno posso solamente consigliarle 👍.Spero di essere stato utile nella scelta, in tal caso fatemelo sapere. 👇 Grazie.

The headphones work great, really like the colour as well. The sound quality of the microphone when talking on the phone isn't great, but that's to be expected with over the head style headphones. The noise cancelling works well and you can connect multiple devices to the headphones to switch between them easily. The only downside of this is that sometimes you can have trouble switching over the audio to the device you want when multiple are connected and might need to ensure the other device is disconnected to have the sound transfer. Overall, great value and would recommend.
